named-query.name: StaCartonLineSn.getStaCartonLineSnByClId
named-query.query: select s from StaCartonLineSn as s where s.staCartonLine.id= :clId

named-query.name: StaCartonLine.getCartonLineByCartonId
named-query.query: select s from StaCartonLine as s where s.staCartonId.id= :cartonId

named-query.name: StaCartonLineSn.getStaCartonLineSnByCode
named-query.query: select s from StaCartonLineSn as s where s.dmgCode=:dmgCode

named-query.name: StaCartonLineSn.findSnbysn
named-query.query: select s from StaCartonLineSn as s where s.sn=:sn
